| HistoryText             = The Fangs were dispatched to rescue the [[Ophelia Sarkissian (Earth-616)|Viper]] from the [[Cristoph Pfeifer (Earth-616)|Iron Monger (Cristoph Pfeifer)]], who was torturing her for information on her latest scheme on behalf of the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]]. The Fangs killed Iron Monger, then brought the Viper back to her broadcast station so she could finish her plan.

Before she could even start, [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America (Steve Rogers)]], [[Silvija Sablinova (Earth-616)|Silver Sable]], and [[Lemar Hoskins (Earth-616)|Battlestar]] invaded their base. The Fangs set out to oppose them, but they all were defeated. Cap then used [[Anthony Manning (Earth-616)|Bludgeon]]'s gun and shot down th Viper's broadcast tower, ending her scheme.{{r|Captain America #419}}
